attributes.action: Sell Great Britain to the Arabs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: because they own the most of it already and they write the law of the land. I have just converted to Islam as it is now the national religion. In all this smart buisiness move could make him a tidy sum and cure the ongoing problem we have with our arab brothers. It seems to have worked so far in N.Ireland, so come on sellout while it's still worth a few RIYAL!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
